name: Compare Screenshots
description: Compare two screenshots to detect visual differences (useful for regression testing). Uses pixel-by-pixel comparison to generate a diff image highlighting changes. Returns percentage of pixels that differ and a visual diff.

screenshot1Id.description: ID of the first screenshot (baseline). Get this from the screenshot_component tool output.

screenshot2Id.description: ID of the second screenshot (comparison). Get this from the screenshot_component tool output.

threshold.description: Difference threshold (0-1). Lower values are more strict (detect tiny changes). 0.1 is recommended for most cases.

ignoreAntialiasing.description: Ignore antialiasing differences (recommended for cross-browser testing).

highlightColor.description: Color for highlighting differences in diff image (CSS color format).
